keywords: TfL,Oyster card, contactless, Travelcards, Point to point tickets, Bus & Tram Pass, free and discounted travel, tickets
description: Information on the different ways to pay for travel in London

breadcrumbs.title: How to pay and where to buy tickets and Oyster
What's the best ticket for me?

title.title: What's the best ticket for me?

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We'll help you choose the best way to pay for your travel."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
You can use contactless (card or device) or an Oyster card to pay as you go on bus, Tube, tram, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail, Emirates Air Line and River Bus services.
You can also travel on most National Rail services in London and some outside London .

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["You only pay for the journeys you make","Travel all over the transport network at any time","Your fares may be \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/pay-as-you-go-caps\"\u003ecapped\u003c/a\u003e so you don't pay more (cheaper than a Day Travelcard) if you make multiple journeys in one day","Top up your card and check your journey history with a \u003ca href=\"https://contactless.tfl.gov.uk/\"\u003econtactless and Oyster account\u003c/a\u003e or our free \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/tfl-oyster-and-contactless-app\"\u003eTfL Oyster and contactless app\u003c/a\u003e ","If you're visiting London, you can also buy a \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/visitor-oyster-card\"\u003eVisitor Oyster card\u003c/a\u003e and get special offers and discounts"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["You only pay for the journeys you make","Pay for your journeys as you travel with no need to top up","Travel all over the transport network at any time","Your fares may be \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/pay-as-you-go-caps\"\u003ecapped\u003c/a\u003e so you don't pay more if you make multiple journeys in one day or week (Monday to Sunday)","Check your journey history with a \u003ca href=\"https://contactless.tfl.gov.uk/\"\u003econtactless and Oyster account\u003c/a\u003e or our free \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/tfl-oyster-and-contactless-app\"\u003eTfL Oyster and contactless app\u003c/a\u003e "]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Make unlimited journeys in the zones covered by your Travelcard","Travel on bus, Tube, tram, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail, Emirates Air Line, River Bus and National Rail services in London","7 Day, Monthly, odd period and Annual Travelcards are available to save you time and money","Day Travelcards are available for Zones 1-9 (using pay as you go with daily \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/pay-as-you-go-caps\"\u003ecapping\u003c/a\u003e is cheaper)","Group Day Travelcards are available for groups of ten or more","If you're visiting London, you can also buy a 2 Day or 3 Day \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/best-ways-for-visitors-to-pay/visitor-pass\"\u003eVisitor Pass\u003c/a\u003e "]}
You can use point to point tickets .
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Get unlimited travel between any two National Rail stations which is cheaper than a Travelcard"]}
You can use a Bus & Tram Pass .

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Unlimited journeys on all buses and trams across London","7 Day, Monthly or Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Passes are available to save you time and money","One Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass is available (using pay as you go with daily \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/pay-as-you-go-caps\"\u003ecapping\u003c/a\u003e is cheaper)"]}
You can get free and discounted travel depending on your age or need:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/5-10-zip-oyster-photocard\"\u003e5-10 Zip Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/11-15-zip-oyster-photocard\"\u003e11-15 Zip Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/16-plus-zip-oyster-photocard\"\u003e16+ Zip Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/18-plus-student-oyster-photocard\"\u003e18+ Student Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/apprentice-oyster-photocard\"\u003eApprentice Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/60-plus-oyster-photocard\"\u003e60+ London Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/freedom-pass\"\u003eFreedom Pass\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/veterans-oyster-photocard\"\u003eVeterans Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/national-railcard-discount\"\u003eNational Railcard discount\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/annual-gold-card-discount\"\u003eAnnual Gold Card discount\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/bus-and-tram-discount\"\u003eBus and Tram discount\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/jobcentre-plus-travel-discount\"\u003eJobcentre Plus Travel Discount\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/travel-for-schools\"\u003eTravel for schools\u003c/a\u003e "]}
